//Â byTimeÂ isÂ aÂ wrapperÂ forÂ sortingÂ theÂ entryÂ arrayÂ byÂ time
//Â (withÂ zeroÂ timeÂ atÂ theÂ end).
typeÂ byTimeÂ []*Entry

funcÂ (sÂ byTime)Â Len()Â intÂ Â Â Â Â Â {Â returnÂ len(s)Â }
funcÂ (sÂ byTime)Â Swap(i,Â jÂ int)Â {Â s[i],Â s[j]Â =Â s[j],Â s[i]Â }
funcÂ (sÂ byTime)Â Less(i,Â jÂ int)Â boolÂ {
Â //Â TwoÂ zeroÂ timesÂ shouldÂ returnÂ false.
Â //Â Otherwise,Â zeroÂ isÂ "greater"Â thanÂ anyÂ otherÂ time.
Â //Â (ToÂ sortÂ itÂ atÂ theÂ endÂ ofÂ theÂ list.)
Â ifÂ s[i].Next.IsZero()Â {
Â Â returnÂ false
Â }
Â ifÂ s[j].Next.IsZero()Â {
Â Â returnÂ true
Â }
Â Â Â Â //Â æ’åºçš„åŸåˆ™ï¼Œs[i]Â æ¯”Â s[j]Â å…ˆè§¦å‘
Â returnÂ s[i].Next.Before(s[j].Next)
}

//Â AddJobÂ addsÂ aÂ JobÂ toÂ theÂ CronÂ toÂ beÂ runÂ onÂ theÂ givenÂ schedule.
//Â TheÂ specÂ isÂ parsedÂ usingÂ theÂ timeÂ zoneÂ ofÂ thisÂ CronÂ instanceÂ asÂ theÂ default.

funcÂ (cÂ *Cron)Â AddJob(specÂ string,Â cmdÂ Job)Â (EntryID,Â error)Â {

Â }

//Â ScheduleÂ addsÂ aÂ JobÂ toÂ theÂ CronÂ toÂ beÂ runÂ onÂ theÂ givenÂ schedule.
//Â TheÂ jobÂ isÂ wrappedÂ withÂ theÂ configuredÂ Chain.
funcÂ (cÂ *Cron)Â Schedule(scheduleÂ Schedule,Â cmdÂ Job)Â EntryIDÂ {

Â deferÂ c.runningMu.Unlock()
Â c.nextID++
Â entryÂ :=Â &Entry{
Â Â ID:Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â c.nextID,
Â Â Schedule:Â Â Â schedule,
Â Â WrappedJob:Â c.chain.Then(cmd),
Â Â Job:Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â cmd,
Â }
Â ifÂ !c.runningÂ {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â //Â ç›´æ¥åŠ 
Â Â c.entriesÂ =Â append(c.entries,Â entry)
Â }Â elseÂ {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â //Â å¼‚æ­¥
Â Â c.addÂ <-Â entry
Â }
Â returnÂ entry.ID

    Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â varÂ timerÂ *time.Timer

    Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â timerÂ =Â time.NewTimer(100000Â *Â time.Hour)

    Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â //Â æ’è¿‡åºï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªè‚¯å®šæ˜¯æœ€å…ˆè¢«æ‰§è¡Œçš„

    Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â forÂ {

              "auto.commit.enable": "false"
            },
            "topics": "source",
            "key.type": "java.lang.String",
            "value.type": "java.lang.String"
          },
          "pre.proc": [
            {
              "dsl.type": "df-opr",
              "rule": "from_json"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "checkpoint": {
        "type": "json",
        "file.path": "hdfs:///griffin/streaming/dump/source",
        "info.path": "source",
        "ready.time.interval": "10s",
        "ready.time.delay": "0",
        "time.range": ["-5m", "0"],
        "updatable": true
      }
    }, {
      "name": "tgt",
      "connectors": [
        {
          "type": "kafka",
          "version": "0.8",
          "config": {
            "kafka.config": {
              "bootstrap.servers": "kafka:9092",
              "group.id": "griffin",
              "auto.offset.reset": "largest",
              "auto.commit.enable": "false"
            },
            "topics": "target",
            "key.type": "java.lang.String",
            "value.type": "java.lang.String"
          },
          "pre.proc": [
            {
              "dsl.type": "df-opr",
              "rule": "from_json"
            }
          ]
        }
      ],
      "checkpoint": {
        "type": "json",
        "file.path": "hdfs:///griffin/streaming/dump/target",
        "info.path": "target",
        "ready.time.interval": "10s",
        "ready.time.delay": "0",
        "time.range": ["-1m", "0"]
      }
    }
  ],
  "evaluate.rule": {
    "rules": [
      {
        "dsl.type": "griffin-dsl",
        "dq.type": "accuracy",
        "out.dataframe.name": "accu",
        "rule": "src.id = tgt.id AND src.name = tgt.name AND src.color = tgt.color AND src.time = tgt.time",
        "details": {
          "source": "src",
          "target": "tgt",
          "miss": "miss_count",
          "total": "total_count",
          "matched": "matched_count"
        },
        "out":[
          {
            "type":"metric",
            "name": "accu"
          },
          {
            "type":"record",
            "name": "missRecords"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  "sinks": ["CONSOLE", "HDFS"]}
